TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit DriveInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class DriveInfo Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 提供对有关驱动器的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to information on a drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类驱动器进行建模，并提供方法和属性来查询有关驱动器的信息。This class models a drive and provides methods and properties to query for drive information. 使用来确定哪些驱动器可用，以及它们是哪种类型的驱动器。Use to determine what drives are available, and what type of drives they are. 此外可以通过查询来确定容量和可用空间的驱动器上。You can also query to determine the capacity and available free space on the drive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

span.span: for accessing directory information.

permission.span: 类构造函数需要此权限。

span.span: The class constructor requires this permission.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string driveName) cil managed

param.name: driveName
param.span: 有效驱动器路径或驱动器号。

span.span: A valid drive path or drive letter.

param.span: 它可以是从“a”到“z”的大写或小写字母。

span.span: This can be either uppercase or lowercase, 'a' to 'z'.
A null value is not valid.

summary.span: 提供对有关指定驱动器的信息的访问。

span.span: Provides access to information on the specified drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类来获取驱动器上的信息。Use this class to obtain information on drives. 驱动器名称必须是大写或小写字母从 a 到 z。The drive name must be either an uppercase or lowercase letter from 'a' to 'z'. 不能使用此方法获取的驱动器名称的信息`null`或使用 UNC (\\\server\share) 路径。You cannot use this method to obtain information on drive names that are `null` or use UNC (\\\server\share) paths.

exception.span: 驱动器号不能为 。

span.span: The drive letter cannot be .

exception.span: 的第一个字母不能是从“a”到“z”的大写或小写字母。

span.span: The first letter of is not an uppercase or lowercase letter from 'a' to 'z'.
-or-

exception.span: 未引用有效的驱动器。

span.span: does not refer to a valid drive.
for accessing directory information.

permission.span: 类构造函数需要此权限。

span.span: The class constructor requires this permission.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AvailableFreeSpace As Long
public: property long AvailableFreeSpace { long get(); };

summary.span: 指示驱动器上的可用空闲空间总量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Indicates the amount of available free space on a drive, in bytes.

value.span: 驱动器上的可用空闲空间量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The amount of free space available on the drive, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示驱动器上的可用空间量。This property indicates the amount of free space available on the drive. 请注意，此数字可能不同于编号因为此属性将放入到帐户磁盘配额。Note that this number may be different from the number because this property takes into account disk quotas. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

exception.span: 拒绝访问驱动器信息。

span.span: Access to the drive information is denied.

exception.span: 发生了 I/O 错误（例如，磁盘错误或驱动器未准备好）。

span.span: An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).

summary.span: 获取文件系统的名称，例如 NTFS 或 FAT32。

span.span: Gets the name of the file system, such as NTFS or FAT32.

value.span: 指定驱动器上文件系统的名称。

span.span: The name of the file system on the specified drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以确定使用的内容对驱动器进行格式化。Use to determine what formatting a drive uses. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

exception.span: 该驱动器不存在或未映射。

span.span: The drive does not exist or is not mapped.

exception.span: 发生了 I/O 错误（例如，磁盘错误或驱动器未准备好）。

span.span: An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DriveType As DriveType
public: property System::IO::DriveType DriveType { System::IO::DriveType get(); };

summary.span: 获取驱动器类型，如 CD-ROM、Removable、Network 或 Fixed。

span.span: Gets the drive type, such as CD-ROM, removable, network, or fixed.

value.span: 指定驱动器类型的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies a drive type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示驱动器是否是以下值之一： `CDRom`， `Fixed`， `Network`， `NoRootDirectory`， `Ram`， `Removable`，或`Unknown`。The property indicates whether a drive is one of the following: `CDRom`, `Fixed`, `Network`, `NoRootDirectory`, `Ram`, `Removable`, or `Unknown`. 这些值中所述枚举。These values are described in the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

summary.span: 检索计算机上的所有逻辑驱动器的驱动器名称。

span.span: Retrieves the drive names of all logical drives on a computer.

returns.span: 类型的数组，表示计算机上的逻辑驱动器。

span.span: An array of type that represents the logical drives on a computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索的计算机上的所有逻辑驱动器名称。This method retrieves all logical drive names on a computer. 此信息可用于循环访问数组并获取在使用其他驱动器上的信息方法和属性。You can use this information to iterate through the array and obtain information on the drives using other methods and properties. 使用属性来测试驱动器是否已准备好，因为未准备好在驱动器上使用此方法将引发。Use the property to test whether a drive is ready because using this method on a drive that is not ready will throw a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

exception.span: 发生了 I/O 错误（例如，磁盘错误或驱动器未准备好）。

span.span: An I/O error occurred (for example, a disk error or a drive was not ready).

exception.span: 调用方没有所要求的权限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission.

permission.span: 对于调用非托管的代码，例如调用本机代码使用平台调用或 COM 互操作。

span.span: for calling unmanaged code, such as calling native code with platform invoke or COM interop.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsReady As Boolean
public: property bool IsReady { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示驱动器是否已准备好的值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a drive is ready.

value.span: 如果驱动器已准备好，则为 ；如果驱动器未准备好，则为 。

span.span: if the drive is ready; if the drive is not ready.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指示驱动器是否已准备就绪。 indicates whether a drive is ready. 例如，它指示一张 CD 是否在 CD 驱动器或可移动存储设备是否准备好进行读/写操作。For example, it indicates whether a CD is in a CD drive or whether a removable storage device is ready for read/write operations. 如果不测试是否驱动器已准备好，并且不准备就绪，查询驱动器使用将引发。If you do not test whether a drive is ready, and it is not ready, querying the drive using will raise an . 不要依赖若要避免捕获异常的其他成员如， ，和。Do not rely on to avoid catching exceptions from other members such as , , and . 你的代码检查的时间之间然后访问的其他属性之一 （即使在检查后进行访问）、 驱动器可能已断开连接或磁盘可能已被删除。Between the time that your code checks and then accesses one of the other properties (even if the access occurs immediately after the check), a drive may have been disconnected or a disk may have been removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. [!code-csharp[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/cs/DriveInfo.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.IO.DriveInfo#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.DriveInfo/vb/DriveInfo.vb#00)]

The name of the drive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性是名称分配到驱动器，例如 C:\ 或 e:\\。This property is the name assigned to the drive, such as C:\ or E:\\. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all of the drives on the current system. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中包含的任何对象对象会自动跟踪和格式化程序序列化。Any objects included in the object are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter. 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 获取或设置驱动器的卷标。

span.span: Gets or sets the volume label of a drive.
The volume label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标签长度是由操作系统确定的。The label length is determined by the operating system. 例如，NTFS 允许卷标为最多 32 个字符长。For example, NTFS allows a volume label to be up to 32 characters long. 请注意，`null`是一个有效。Note that `null` is a valid . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类当前系统上显示有关所有驱动器的信息。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to display information about all the drives on the current system.
